Custom Dialogs Module¶

Created on Tue Jun 25 13:16:39 2024

@author: Jason Crook MySoftDev lLC.

class CustomDialogs¶

Bases: object

A class containing static methods to create custom dialog boxes for the application.

static add_course_dialog(parent)¶
static add_user_dialog(parent)¶

Create a custom dialog for adding a user.

Parameters: parent (tk.Tk): The parent window.

Returns: dict: A dictionary containing user_id, email, password, and user_type.
